description: RB Cruiser is an urban skate designed for tough, fast maneuvering. RB molded boots are durable in all skating environments, featuring four urban profile 80mm/85a Urban Profile wheels and SG7 bearings for added control, stability and speed. Ultimate lateral support and sliders, a dual-buckle/lace secure closure system with shock-absorbing padding in the heel and an attached brake make RB Cruiser ultra-responsive and versatile for skaters of all abilities.
